The issue of the Nile River is a fateful issue that transcends all concerns and transcends all differences and transcends all personal interests and individual visions. # President # National Power Conference
On behalf of the Egyptian people, I extend my sincere condolences on the death of the martyr Capt. Mohammed Abu Shakra, to his family and all the Egyptian police. #President
The Nile water shortage is one drop
I do not doubt for a moment that we will succeed in overcoming the challenges of trust in God and then depending on the Egyptian will that defeats the odds # President # National Power Conference
The problem we face today was not the result of the moment but the outcome of past accumulations
It is decided to form a national committee comprising the official and popular bodies and experts in the Nile water file
Egypt's water security can not be overcome or compromised. All options are open in dealing with this file # President
I invite everyone to give advice and I am happy to receive my input and opinion, although I disagree with some of the President's views
I will not despair of calling for a comprehensive national reconciliation aimed at the absolute and sincere loyalty of our beloved Egypt without the slogans or omissions of the president
I am confident that the call for national reconciliation will resonate with political leaders who do not increase their affiliation to this country and their love for the president
Ready to go to everyone for the sake of the country # President
We affirm the mutual respect and brotherly relations with the friendly and brotherly African peoples, based on Egypt's historical and cultural responsibility
I call on all political forces to forget the differences at this stage to protect Egypt and its people
Common interests and unity of destiny The people of the Nile Basin are united in a single association that rejects the conflict and narrow interests of each of the parties

When we came out with victory, we put ourselves in place of those who lost, not their proud.
In 2009 elections, we analyzed the results from the polls to the smallest point. We tried to understand the people who did not vote for us.
We have to provide the safety of life, property, reason, generation, faith as the state's grandfather.
Even though we came in with 50% of the votes, we always saw ourselves as 100% party.
We never discriminated. From east to west, we tried to do what was required from the south to the north.
We believe that we have accomplished this to a great extent. 11 years ago Hakkari, Sirnak, Ağrı, Mus, Iğdır'a airport believed that the airport would be done.
We have never accepted the line that differentiates, differentiates. We have always been in favor of helal without embracing.
We are analyzing those who have lived in recent days to every point. Who are behind these events, we are investigating them.
If we listen to democratic demands until now, we will listen after that.
When we look at the events, is it clear what they want? Did you understand? We will not let them bloom to stir the straw with the straw.
For 11 years, we have managed to deal with different schemes, we will continue to stand erect, we will continue to protect the sensitivity of the nation with determination.
The events that started with the relocation of the Gezi Park in Taksim started to deviate in much different directions.
This project, which consists of dismantling some trees and moving them to another place, was started with the approval of the CHP. They deny it.
The impulses of some politics have raised the objections there. Those who were there carried out an environmental massacre themselves.
Two minutes on why our kids need #BetterSchools: http://t.co/OZVoQiuTFx TeamJG
The Turkish economy has been targeted with these events. Interest rates have been raised. These have always been with the solidarity of the outside.
This has triggered a systematic project. It is not possible to see these incidents as a search for democratic rights.
Those who act now in Taksim are being used openly by the people who are interested in the Turkish economy.
Retweet this if you want Queensland students to get the best education possible. #BetterSchools TeamJG http://t.co/P2lvLAJ2kn
Congratulations on the day.100 years of voting for women! And 100 years of gender equality! #stemmerettsjubileet
I expect all the demonstrators to see the big picture and end their actions and withdraw as prime minister.
We've always been through tough processes. In this country, our beliefs are good for our people.
Only in a country where 99% of its people are Muslims, our daughters could not go to university because they wear headscarves.
Many had to go abroad. I filed a lawsuit against the party on the grounds that I brought it in Spain.
As a living father, I know very well what the restrictions of freedom are.
By holding on from the headscarves of our headscarved girls, how will those who drift them in places will give their account?

Increasing standards of democracy disturbs both inside and outside.
Someone wants to get back their lost privileges. However, this one has hit the hard rock this time.
We want to connect the best minds of the world to present new solutions to global challenges, which can not be treated with individually
With 76 million, Turkey will have the strongest power to democracy as a single heart.
To overthrow elected governments, to disregard the results of the polls is a habit of the past and it has no validity today.
The Middle East is not a region of tensions & conflicts but a region where cultures, civilizations and innovation can meet and flourish
These people will not forget the late Menderes and Ozal. This saintly nation will not forget Necmettin Erbakan on 28 February.
We want to establish real connections, to build a better future for the people of our region & to restore its role in history and civilization
One step closer on the road to Brazil!! @Socceroos #AUSvJOR JG
After the events of the Trip Park, do not let anyone rub their hands and get caught up in different enthusiasm. Turkey will continue to grow in every area.
Turkey will not hesitate to provide the best service in education, justice, security.
Turkey is among the countries that shine in scientific study and publication.
The education that is imparted today is the seed that will germinate tomorrow in a better country. Happy students' Day!
